BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat.

[PAWN_nameDef] spent the majority of their vat time in the 'Default' enhanced learning suite, where [PAWN_pronoun] experienced a moderately comfortable simulated childhood on a peaceful urbworld, splitting their time between simulated school and playing with simulated friends.
The speed of growth and low resolution of the simulation has limited [PAWN_possessive] childhood growth potential.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown cadet
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat.

[PAWN_nameDef] spent the majority of their vat time in the 'Soldier' enhanced learning suite, where [PAWN_pronoun] drilled extensively in combat skills and operations at a simulated military cadet school, on a high-tech urbworld with a proud military ideology and a history of fighting nests of megaspiders on nearby planets... Would You Like To Know More?
The speed of growth and low resolution of the simulation has limited [PAWN_possessive] childhood growth potential.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown homesteader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat.

[PAWN_nameDef] spent the majority of their vat time in the 'Labor' enhanced learning suite, where [PAWN_pronoun] experienced a simulated childhood in an idyllic but tough off-grid homestead on a remote agriworld, learning by experience the skills they needed to survive with the land and maintain a modestly successful farm.
The speed of growth and low resolution of the simulation has limited [PAWN_possessive] childhood growth potential.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown academy pupil
BackstoryDef.baseDesc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat.

[PAWN_nameDef] spent the majority of their time in the 'Leader' enhanced learning suite, where [PAWN_pronoun] experienced an enviable simulated childhood spent in a luxurious, but highly competitive private academy on a decadent glitterworld. [PAWN_nameDef] was required to compete with other simulated students for the approval of their teachers in a dramatic and stylish fashion, often with unexpected results. Throughout these lessons and trials [PAWN_nameDef] learned about the arts, economics, medicine, science and the skills required to be leaders of their field.
Due to the slower growth mode and higher-resolution of the simulation [PAWN_possessive] childhood growth nearly reached it's full potential.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown dream-child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat. [PAWN_nameDef] spent the majority of their time in the 'Play' suite, where [PAWN_pronoun] experienced life in a danger-free child's wonderland of colorful characters and playful adventures in Never Past Bedtime Land. While [PAWN_nameDef] didn't learn many skills in this simulation, they did experience as rich and full a childhood as any parent could dream of.
